name: Painted Wings
description:
Painted wings was a month long mini-production by the team at Skyward. The theme for the project was watercolor and New Zealand nature.

Goal: Hop, Jump, fly, dash and glide your way through a beautiful New Zealand inspired canopy as a native Hihi bird. Collect berries and dragonflies as you fly towards home.

Please note: The vines one level two are very buggy, something broke in our final build *shrugs*.

Please leave a comment and let us know what you think! We are looking to take one prototype to a full production so logging your interest helps us.

Controls:
WASD/L joystick - Movement
Mouse/R joystick - Camera
Space/A - Jump/Double jump
Space/A (Hold) - Glide
L shift/B - Dash
R2 - Objective focus
